name: MIRCaM Data EXchange File
summary: An MDEX file is a data exchange file used by MIRCaM, a system used to record and view electrocardiogram (ECG) data. It contains patient information such as names and ECGs recorded by a MIRCaM device. MDEX files are used to export and import data in the MIRCaM ECG Viewer application.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
